title: The Little Princesses Magical Party
description: The two Little Princesses have so much fun in the castle but they only have each other to play with and they long for more friends. They decide to invite all the girls from the village to join them in a magical party. Youâ€™re invited to come along and discover how they learn what being a true princess really means and what all the girls discover at this fun and magical party.
author: Rosemary R. Evans
